title: Workshop on Tool Utilization for Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and practical experience in language education
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in utilizing collaborative learning design tools within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can compare two or more computer-supported collaborative learning (CSCL) design tools and describe their unique features
Participants can create language education collaborative learning scenarios using mobile-optimized design tools
Participants can propose implementation strategies for learning design tools compatible with existing digital platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
